alert.note: Alert for Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 12:16AM MST until November 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY FOR SNOW AND BLOWING SNOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph early. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range and Snowy Range. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Falling and blowing snow will create very low visibilities. Hikers, hunters and snow mobilers could easily become disoriented and lost.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
